Interface UnivariateFunction

All Superinterfaces:
ContinuousFunction<Real,Real>, DifferentiableFunction<Real,Real>, Function<Real,Real>, ScalarFunction<Real>
public interface UnivariateFunction extends ScalarFunction<Real>, DifferentiableFunction<Real,Real>
Univariate function (single variable: ℝ → ℝ).
Since:
2.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    • integrate

      default Real integrate(Real a, Real b)
      Computes the integral from a to b.
      Parameters:
      a - lower bound
      b - upper bound
      Returns:
      the definite integral
